name: protocol-subgraphs
description: This package contains subgraphs of the Australis protocol

scripts.prepare:subgraph:aurora-mainnet: mustache ./config/aurora-mainnet.json ./templates/aurora.subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && rm -rf generated && npm run generate:schema && npm run subgraph:codegen && npm run subgraph:build
scripts.prepare:subgraph:aurora-testnet: mustache ./config/aurora-testnet.json ./templates/aurora.subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && rm -rf generated && npm run generate:schema && npm run subgraph:codegen && npm run subgraph:build
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=auroa NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph:aurora-mainnet && SLUG=australisfinance/australis env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:testnet: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=auroa NETWORK=testnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph:aurora-testnet && SLUG=australisfinance/australis-testnet env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted

author: Australis
